# [Interview #462: TGS Signing Report - Old (Peter) Salt, Entry #24](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=462#24)

#### Question

Harine appears once just after she arrives from the Sea Folk. What happened to her?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Harine has not been forgotten. There hasnâ€™t been a lot for her to do, and Rand is not keeping his side of the Bargain of keeping her close.
